snippet: The news that Oklahoma is now ready to accept and celebrate Woody Guthrie as a native son with an exhibition and study center for his archives is long overdue.
abstract: Editorial asserts that Oklahoma's decision to accept Woody Guthrie as a native son and celebrate his work with an exhibition and a study center for his archives is long overdue.
lead_paragraph: The news that Oklahoma is now ready to accept and celebrate Woody Guthrie as a native son with an exhibition and study center for his archives is long overdue.

headline.seo: Homeward Goes the Dust Bowl Balladeer
headline.main: Homeward Goes the Dust Bowl Balladeer
headline.print_headline: Homeward Goes the Dust Bowl Balladeer
